The best comedy on the net

While we hope that rec.humor.funny is the best humor page on the Web, we recognize that we don't have a monopoly on comedy. Accordingly, we'd like to identify for you some other good humor sources which you may want to check out.

We would like to warn you in advance that since rec.humor.funny is the net's oldest and most popular comedy publication and newsgroup, you will find reprints of rec.humor.funny jokes in most humor Web pages. We have selected the entries in this list on the basis of their originality and quality. If you have a comedy page and like our pages, we hope you'll link to them as well.

  • The best humor web pages on the Net
  • The best canonical lists on the Net
  • The best cartoons and comic strips on the Net
  • The best newsgroups
